Get mapping between transcripts and genes

Source: R/tximport.R
getTx2gene.Rd

This function uses the biomaRt package.

getTx2gene(species = "mmusculus", version = NULL, outputDir = "data")

Arguments

species

String used to pass paste0(species, "_gene_ensembl") as the dataset argument to biomaRt::useEnsembl(). To see available datasets, do mart = biomaRt::useEnsembl("genes"); biomaRt::listDatasets(mart).

version

Passed to biomaRt::useEnsembl(). NULL indicates the latest version. To see available versions, do biomaRt::listEnsemblArchives().

outputDir

Directory in which to save the result, a file named "tx2gene.csv.gz". If NULL, no file is saved.

Value

A data.table based on the result from biomaRt::getBM(), with an attribute 'version'.

Contents

Developed by Jake Hughey.
